extension_description.message: Fassara zaɓin rubutu akan shafin yanar gizon kuma canza zuwa ƙayyadadden tsari.

turn_off_description.message: Maɓallin Fassara zai buɗe duk lokacin da aka zaɓi rubutu

turn_on_description.message: Maɓallin Fassara ba zai bayyana lokacin da aka zaɓi rubutu ba amma har yanzu kuna iya fassara ta danna gunkin Fassara Pro a mashaya kayan aiki

auto_switch.message: Canza ta atomatik zuwa yaren manufa na biyu

auto_switch_description.message: Lokacin da aka zaɓa rubutun shine tsohowar harshen manufa, fassara shi zuwa yaren manufa na biyu

second_target_language_description.message: Zaɓi yaren manufa na biyu tsoho

target_format_description.message: Zaɓi tsarin da aka yi niyya na tsoho, tsarin na iya zama canji a rukunin fassarar

auto_set_format_description.message: Lokacin canza tsari a cikin rukunin fassarar, saita zaɓin tsari zuwa tsarin tsoho

format_and_order_description.message: Tsara lokuta waɗanda za a iya canzawa a cikin rukunin fassarar da odar nuni

translate_button_on_description.message: Maɓallin Fassara zai buɗe duk lokacin da aka zaɓi rubutu

translate_button_off_description.message: Maɓallin Fassara ba zai bayyana lokacin da aka zaɓi rubutu ba amma har yanzu kuna iya fassara ta danna gunkin Fassara Pro a mashaya kayan aiki
